shut_the_door.description: Shut the table door to maintain order.

swing_open_the_door.description: Swing open the table door to access the inside.

scrub_door.description: Scrub the table door to alleviate the accumulation of dust and grime.

inspection_of_door.description: Inspect the table door for any visible damage or faults.

disinfect_door.description: Disinfect the table door to maintain its cleanliness and safety.

status_check_door.description: Check the status of the table door to ensure it's not damaged or malfunctioning.

secure_door.description: Secure the door to protect the contents inside the table.

open_door.description: Open the table door to get access to items inside the table.

close_door.description: Close the table door to secure items inside the table.

polish_door.description: Polish the table door to maintain reflections and prevent damage.

inspect_door.description: Inspect table door for any damages or wear and tear

clean_door.description: Clean the table door to remove any dust or dirt.

scrub_the_table_body.description: Scrub the table body to get rid of dust and grime.

status_check_of_table_body.description: Check the status of the table body for any visible damage, wear and tear.

disinfect_table_body.description: Disinfect the body of the table to maintain its cleanliness and safety.

status_check_table_body.description: Check the status of the table body to ensure it's not damaged or worn out.

polish_table_body.description: Polish the table body to maintain its glossy finish and prevent discoloration.

inspect_table_finish.description: Inspect the table body's finish to detect any scratches, dings, or dents.

inspect_table_body.description: Inspect the condition of the table body, looking for damages or discoloration.

clean_table_body.description: Clean the body of the table to maintain its appearance and hygiene.

clean_body_and_door.description: Clean both the table body and door for the overall cleanliness of the table.

general_inspection.description: A general inspection of the table body and door to check for any visible faults or damages.

operate_door_and_clean_table.description: Open the table door for access to the inside and clean the body of the table.

close_door_and_clean_table.description: Shut the table door and clean the body of the table to maintain order and cleanliness.

disinfect_whole_table.description: Disinfect the entire table including the table body and door.

status_check_whole_table.description: Check the status of the entire table including the table body and door for any signs of damage or wear and tear.

secure_whole_table.description: Secure the whole table, ensure the door is closed and table contents are safe.

full_inspection.description: Perform a full inspection of the table's body and door for any sign of damages.

full_cleaning.description: Clean and polish the entire table, including the table door and body.

inspect_whole_table.description: Perform overall inspection of the entire table including the table body and door

clean_whole_table.description: Clean the entire table including the table body and door
